thread.title: Lady Gaga's Super Bowl halftime show featured a circle piano and crashed the company's website
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga's Super Bowl halftime show featured a circle piano and crashed the company's website

author: James Dator
title: Lady Gaga's Super Bowl halftime show featured a circle piano and crashed the company's website
text:
Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl halftime show was full of music, fire, swinging on wires and torches — but one thing really stood out. THIS CIRCULAR PIANO! 
The piano, called a “Pianoarc” is made by a company of the same name. Shortly after it appeared during the halftime show the company’s site completely crashed. Nobody can learn anything about them.
Thankfully we have a cached version to tell us a little more. The Pianoarc features 294 keys and are custom built. There’s only the ability to request a quote — which means they cost a whole lot.
Either way these look absolutely incredible and was one of the most memorable things about an already stellar halftime show.
